desc: Our organic bars are non-GMO project verified, certified gluten-free, and made in Canada only with real ingredients. From the farmers who grow our organic ingredients, to the staff who manufacture our products, we’re all dedicated to (some would say obsessed with) our vision of providing nutritious, wholesome snacks.

layout.text: Taste the zesty flavours of summer with this irresistible organic granola bar that gets your taste buds revving, while stopping guilt in its tracks.
